timelineitems.title: Full-stack Development Bootcamp
timelineitems.description:
10-week intense Bootcamp (+ 520 hours) executed in 3 modules:- Module 1: frontend development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Object-oriented programming. The module was evaluated by the development of a game using OOP.

- Module 2: introduction to React.js and the first steps to backend (API, axios, Node.js). The module was evaluated by the developent of an app using CRUD operations.

- Module 3: introduction to Express.js, MongoDB and Mongoose. The module was evaluated by creating a full-stack app.

Project 2 and 3 were executed in pairs (pair-programming), as well using Git and GitHub. During the Bootcamp we got an introduction to the Agile Way of Working | Scrum.
